## Site Structure Overview

This document organizes the Gies College of Business website into logical sections with hierarchical relationships. Each section includes relevant pages with descriptions and contextual information.

## Primary Sections

### 1. About Gies
> Information about the college, leadership, facilities, and history

- [Home Page](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu) - Main college website landing page
- [Dean's Office](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/dean) - Information about college leadership
- [Our Facilities](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/our-story/facilities) - Campus buildings and resources
- [College Facts](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/our-story/gies-facts) - Key statistics and information
- [Office of Access and Community](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/our-story/access-and-community) - Diversity and inclusion initiatives
- [Wymer Hall](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/wymerhall) - Information about this college building

### 2. Academic Programs
> Degree programs offered by the college

#### 2.1 Undergraduate Programs
- [Admissions Information](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/admissions) - Application process and requirements
- [Majors and Minors Overview](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/majors-and-minors) - All undergraduate programs
- [Global Programs](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/gies-global) - International study opportunities
- [Honors Programs](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/honors) - Advanced academic opportunities
- [Scholarships](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/scholarships) - Financial aid information
- [Student Outcomes](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/undergraduate-outcomes) - Career placement statistics

##### Undergraduate Majors
> All undergraduate students participate in a "Cohort Sequence" with four foundational business courses. The curriculum is designed for career readiness with strong emphasis on experiential learning.

- [Accountancy](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/majors-and-minors/accounting) - Bachelor's degree in Accounting
- [Finance](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/majors-and-minors/finance) - Bachelor's degree in Finance
- [Information Systems](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/majors-and-minors/information-systems) - Bachelor's degree in IS
- [Management](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/majors-and-minors/management) - Bachelor's degree in Management
- [Marketing](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/majors-and-minors/marketing) - Bachelor's degree in Marketing
- [Operations Management](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/majors-and-minors/operations-management) - Bachelor's degree in OM
- [Supply Chain Management](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/majors-and-minors/supply-chain-management) - Bachelor's degree in SCM
- [Strategy, Innovation, & Entrepreneurship](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/majors-and-minors/entrepreneurship) - Bachelor's degree in SIE

##### Combined Data Science Majors
- Accountancy + Data Science
- Finance + Data Science
- Business + Data Science

##### Special Programs and Minors
- [Hoeft Technology & Management Program](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/majors-and-minors/hoeft-technology-management) - Specialized program
- [Business Minor](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/majors-and-minors/business-minor) - Minor for non-business majors
- Business Analytics Minor
- International Business Minor

#### 2.2 Graduate Programs
> Master's and doctoral programs

##### Master's Programs
- [All Graduate Programs](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/graduate) - Overview of all master's offerings
- [Accountancy Programs](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/accountancy) - Master's in Accounting options
  - [MSA Program](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/msa) - Master of Science in Accountancy
  - [MAS Program](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/mas) - Master of Accounting Science
  - [iMSA Online Program](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/online/imsa) - Online Accounting Master's
- [Business Analytics (MSBA)](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/msba) - Master's in Business Analytics
- [Finance (MSF)](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/msf) - Master's in Finance
- [Management Programs](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/management) - Master's in Management options
  - [MSM Program](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/msm) - Master of Science in Management
  - [iMSM Online Program](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/online/imsm) - Online Management Master's
- [MBA Programs](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/imba) - MBA degree options
  - [iMBA Online Program](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/online/imba) - Fully online MBA
- [Technology Management (MSTM)](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/mstm) - Master's in Technology Management
- [Business Administration](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/business-administration) - MS in Business Administration

##### Doctoral Programs
- [All Doctoral Programs](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/doctoral) - Overview of PhD options
- [Accountancy PhD](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/doctoral/accountancy) - Doctoral program in Accounting
- [Finance PhD](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/doctoral/finance) - Doctoral program in Finance
- [Business Administration PhD](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/doctoral/business-administration) - Doctoral program in Business

##### Professional Credentials
- [Overview](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/gies-professional-credentials) - Non-degree certificates
- [Strategic Leadership Management Certificate](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/gies-professional-credentials/strategic-leadership-management-graduate-certificate) - Leadership credential
- [iCademies](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/gies-professional-credentials/icademies) - Online course offerings

#### 2.3 Online Education
- [All Online Programs](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/online) - Overview of online degrees
- [iMBA](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/online/imba) - Online MBA program
- [iMSA](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/online/imsa) - Online Master's in Accounting
- [iMSM](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/graduate-hub/online/imsm) - Online Master's in Management

### 3. Student Experience
> Resources and opportunities for students

- [Student Organizations](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/experience/student-organizations) - Clubs and associations
- [Academic Advising](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/experience/academic-advising) - Academic guidance resources
- [Career Development](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/experience/career-professional-development) - Career services
- [Academies](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/experience/academies-centers) - Specialized learning communities
- [Experiential Learning](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/experience/experiential-learning) - Hands-on educational experiences including:
  - **Action Learning**: Students work with 200+ companies annually through "Business in Action" (B301)
  - **Illinois Business Consulting (IBC)**: Nation's largest student-run university consultancy open to all majors
  - **Innovation Labs**: MakerLab, iVenture, and Disruption Lab provide specialized experiential opportunities
- [Illinois MakerLab](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/experience/makerlab) - 3D printing and prototyping lab
- [iVenture Accelerator](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/experience/iventure) - Startup accelerator program
- [Disruption Lab](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/disruption-lab) - Innovation initiative
- [Visit Information](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/experience/visit-us) - Campus visit details
- [Access and Multicultural Engagement](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/undergraduate-hub/access-multicultural-engagement) - Diversity resources

### 4. Research
> Faculty research and academic initiatives

- [Research Overview](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/faculty-research/research-at-gies) - Research programs summary
- [Research Centers & Initiatives](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/research/centers-initiatives) - Specialized research groups
- [Research Lab](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/research/research-at-gies#Research-Lab) - Research facilities
- [Research Articles](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/faculty-research/research-articles) - Published research
- [Faculty Profiles](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/faculty-research/faculty-profiles) - Directory of researchers
- [Faculty & Staff Directory](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/faculty-research/faculty-staff-directory) - Complete personnel listing
- [Academic Departments](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/faculty-research/academic-departments) - Departmental structure
- [Teaching Excellence](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/faculty-research/teaching-excellence) - Pedagogical initiatives

## Topic-Based Index

### Programs by Type
- **Undergraduate Degrees**: Accountancy, Finance, Information Systems, Management, Marketing, Operations Management, Supply Chain Management, Entrepreneurship
- **Master's Degrees**: MSA, MAS, MSBA, MSF, MSM, MBA, MSTM
- **Doctoral Programs**: Accountancy, Finance, Business Administration
- **Online Programs**: iMBA, iMSA, iMSM
- **Certificates**: Strategic Leadership Management

### Key Resources
- **Prospective Students**: Application info, Visit planning, Program descriptions
- **Current Students**: Academic advising, Career development, Student organizations
- **Faculty/Staff**: Directory, Research opportunities, Academic departments
- **Alumni**: Events, Networking, Giving opportunities
- **Corporate Partners**: Recruitment, Collaboration, Workforce development

### Recent Updates
The most recently updated content appears to be news articles from April 2025, including stories about student entrepreneurship, educational technology, program rankings, and alumni recognition.
